item.title: makeSlider : Simple Javascript SlideShow Generator
item.dc:creator: colxi
item.description: makeSlider is a simple javascript method designed to generate elemental scrolling slideshows, with minimun lines of code, using CSS3’s transition property. You just need to generate the following simple HTML structure: —- Slider Container (div with unique ID) ——– Items Container div ———— Item1 ———— Item2 ———— Item3 ———— (more...

item.title: geoAsteroids: Scratch mini-game
item.dc:creator: colxi
item.description: Partial reimplementation of the classic game Asteroids, using Scratch language. As in the original game, the player can move arround in the map (Arrow keys), jumping to the oposite side of the screen when the border is reached. All the asteroids must be destroyed (Space Bar)....
